name: Siamese
description: The Siamese cat is known for its striking blue almond-shaped eyes and short coat with color points on the ears, face, paws, and tail.

name: Persian
description: Persian cats are characterized by their long, luxurious coats, round faces, and sweet temperaments. They require regular grooming.

name: Maine Coon
description: The Maine Coon is one of the largest domesticated cat breeds. They have a muscular build, tufted ears, and a shaggy coat.
